summary: 1938: A young man arrives in Hitler's Germany, frantically seeking information about his German mother, and finds she is pending execution at a concentration camp.
cast: Norma Shearer|Robert Taylor|Conrad Veidt|Alla Nazimova|Felix Bressart|Albert Bassermann|Philip Dorn|Edgar Barrier|Bonita Granville|Elsa Bassermann|Blanche Yurka|Lisa Golm|Edit Angold|Walter Bonn|Albert D'Arno|Helmut Dantine|Kay Deslys|Ernst Deutsch|Gretl Dupont|William Edmunds|Christl Ehlers|Arno Frey|Frederick Giermann|Hans Joby|Erwin Kalser|Howard Lang|Florine McKinney|Adolph Milar|Marianne Mosner|Lotte Palfi Andor|Maria Ray|Henry Rowland|Gerta Rozan|Hans Schumm|Janet Shaw|Marianne Stewart|Anya Taranda|Henry Victor|Frederick Vogeding|Marek Windheim|Fred Wolff|William Yetter Sr.|Wolfgang Zilzer
title: Escape
